document_data.name: Masauwu
document_data.title: Skeleton Man
document_data.mainbody: '''Masauwu''', also called the '''Skeleton Man''', was a [[spirit]] in the culture of the [[Azuposi]], a [[human]] civilization of [[Maztica]].
document_data.Shrines: Across the Azuposi landscape, shrines to Masauwu were constructed by travelers who believed that he would offer them protection during their travels. The shrines consisted of piles of decorative stones and offerings of [[grass]].
